title: Fable III (DRM-free) [ENG] Lossless Repack
description:
This torrent features the first DRM-free English repack of Fable III. You do not have to download a crack or install Games for Windows Live for this to work.

Normally I would tell you to support the developers by buying the game, but since Microsoft decided to shut down G4WL a week ago, it's no longer possible.

Thanks to Timeslip for making a DRM-free release possible.
